TITLE: Help - FastComments
HEADING: Don't Worry, We're a Login Away
REQUIRES_LOGIN: This page requires you to have an account and be logged in.
ACCOUNT_TYPES: There are different kinds of accounts. Select the login or registration link that best suites you.
SITE_OWNER: I'm a site owner that wants to use FastComments and I have a question
COMMENTER: I just write comments - I don't want to run FastComments on a site, but I have a question.
